title: Run Towards Your Fear
lyrics:
Here, right here
When it's too much for me to take
They can't see straight
When it's too much for you to take
You're the only one
You're the only one
I'm the only one
You're dressed in black & following the purple string
So run towards your fears
When it's too much for you to take
I can't believe the way you breathe
On the mirror leaves often marks
I draw your name inside the cloud
You laugh
So what begins?
